description: This source file implements Base64 encoding and decoding functions for the Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC). It contains functions to encode data to Base64 and decode Base64 strings back to their original binary form, including helper functions for line-by-line decoding.

methods.name: PUCHAR AnscBase64DecodeLine(const PUCHAR pString,PUCHAR pData,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Decodes a single line of a Base64 encoded message into its original binary form.
parameters: const PUCHAR pString - the Base64 encoded input string
PUCHAR pData - buffer to receive decoded data
PULONG pulSize - pointer to size of buffer; updated to actual decoded size
methods.return: PUCHAR - pointer to decoded data buffer, no need to free

methods.name: PUCHAR AnscBase64Decode(PUCHAR pEncode,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Decodes a Base64 encoded string into original data buffer.
parameters: PUCHAR pEncode - Base64 encoded input string
PULONG pulSize - pointer to variable to receive size of decoded data
methods.return: PUCHAR - pointer to decoded data buffer, must be freed by caller

methods.name: PUCHAR AnscBase64Encode(const PUCHAR pBuf,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Encodes binary data into a Base64 string.
parameters: const PUCHAR pBuf - pointer to data to encode
ULONG ulSize - size of data to encode
methods.return: PUCHAR - pointer to Base64 encoded string, must be freed by caller
